messages.subject: Re: Thank-you
messages.msgSnippet: ... post in ... last 2 ... with our ... much just ... therapists! ... One caution is that you don t want to tell him that he has to learn about the history of
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, HOMESCHOOL4GOOD@a...
wrote:
> We just wanted to say thank-you to everyone that responded to our
post in
> regard to unschooling our son. We really have learned a lot in the
last 2
> days! It has made us see that we have to change a lot of our ways
with our
> him (which is good). We never thought that a child could learn so
much just
> from animals! We move forward now (with open eyes) and without the
therapists!
> Kim & Kevin

One caution is that you don't want to tell him that he has to learn
about the history of animals or the geography of animals, or do
reports to show you what he has learned. Don't make unit studies up
or anything. Just give him fun stuff to do that he will enjoy, let
him follow his passions, and know in your heart that he will learn
what he needs, when he needs. it. :)
Sheila

messages.subject: Re: Thank-you
messages.msgSnippet: We just wanted to say thank-you to everyone that responded to our post in regard to unschooling our son. We really have learned a lot in the last 2 days! It
messages.messageBody:
We just wanted to say thank-you to everyone that responded to our post in
regard to unschooling our son. We really have learned a lot in the last 2
days! It has made us see that we have to change a lot of our ways with our
him (which is good). We never thought that a child could learn so much just
from animals! We move forward now (with open eyes) and without the therapists!
Kim & Kevin
